reviews.review_msg: His course was difficult for me, being a written course too. When you would make a mistake in the lab, he would never talk down or be rude. He will help find out what went wrong and would let you take another person's lab data if something went horribly wrong. The TAs he had were the best TAs I've ever had.
Super duper nice guy, and will go the extra mile to ensure you understand. The grading criteria isn't always clear and he can be a bit disorganized at times, but really enjoying his class.
Although this was a lab course, every time he did a lecture, he knew what he was talking about. Very aloof person and kept the lab light
